entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Vostok ‚Äî Story Maker
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Welcome to Vostok ‚Äì your ultimate companion for crafting captivating stories and stunning collages, designed to elevate your social media presence! With Vostok, transforming your ideas into professional-grade posts and stories is now a breeze. Whether you're a blogger, photographer, or simply love sharing your life's moments on social media, Vostok provides all the tools you need to create content that will make an impact. Our sleek and user-friendly app seamlessly combines your passion for photography and storytelling, offering a dynamic platform to showcase your awe-inspiring moments. Embracing a minimalist style, Vostok becomes your canvas for unlimited creativity. A vast collection of templates, stickers, and effects empowers you to design unique stories that reflect your individuality. But Vostok goes beyond creative freedom; it's all about simplicity. Our intuitive interface makes editing and sharing your content effortless, freeing up more time for you to focus on crafting compelling narratives that your followers will adore. No more waiting! Embark on your Vostok journey today and craft captivating posts and stories that leave a lasting impression! Here's a glimpse of some of our features: ¬∑ 200+ design templates for social media ¬∑ Exclusive fonts with Cyrillic support ¬∑ 450+ unique stickers ¬∑ Atmospheric dust and grain effects for photos ¬∑ Variety of backgrounds: paper textures, marble, gradients, colors ¬∑ Ad-free with no subscription requirements ¬∑ Dark mode compatibility Recognized as one of the Best Apps of 2019 by Apple. With over 200+ templates, Vostok is your go-to toolkit for creating standout social media content. We eagerly look forward to your ideas and feedback. Connect with us at hello@vostokapp.ru or drop us a direct message on Instagram at @vostokapp.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$5.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [Free ~ $5.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Train Dispatcher!2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.29 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Drive trains and carry passengers on Japanese railway lines. „ÉªSimple brain game "Train Dispatcher!2" is a brain game with simple rules. No expertise required. Train fans, game fans, everyone can enjoy it. „ÉªTo everyone who will become a train dispatcher In the morning in Japan, customers are waiting for the arrival of the train to go to work. Let's start the train and transport the customers. „ÉªGoal of the game Japanese railway companies are for-profit organizations. Let's aim for high operating profit! „ÉªHow to make profit Fare revenue - Departure cost = Operating profit. Fare revenue is generated when passengers board at a station. Example) If two passengers board a train at a station with a fare of 20, the company receives 40. Departure costs are charged according to the number of cars when the train departs. Example) 30 for a 2-car train, 40 for a 4-car train, and 70 for a 10-car train. One person can ride in one car. Fare revenue is generated when customers board the train. Adjust the driving schedule and the number of vehicles to aim for the highest profit. Departure costs. If you run too many trains and the occupancy rate drops, you'll lose revenue. „ÉªHow to operate The game is very easy to operate and the rules are simple. All you have to do is adjust the number of train cars and make the trains depart at the best time. As the game progresses, various variations such as express trains and transfer stations will appear. „ÉªVolume Enjoy over 50 routes. Please experience the wide variety of transportation strategies of Japanese railway companies. No ads, no charges. „ÉªNo ads, no billing Please concentrate on the game. Children can also enjoy the game. Share your results on Social Media. „ÉªTrain lines you can play with JR East Japan JR Tokai JR West Japan JR Kyushu Tobu Tokyu Seibu Keio Keikyu Keihan Hankyu Hanshin Kintetsu Meitetsu Odakyu Nankai Seitetsu Sotetsu Keisei Tokyo Metro Osaka Metro Toei Subway Tsukuba Express „ÉªCapacity is about 130MB The storage burden is also small. There is no heavy processing at all.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MyTracks: GPS Recorder
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime PremiumÔºö$9.99
  • 300 Altitude Query TimesÔºö$3.99
  • 100 Altitude Query TimesÔºö$2.99

Application Description

MyTracks is an app that helps you keep track of your location using GPS data. It's perfect for various activities like hiking, running, walking, biking, and more. This app uses advanced technology to provide precise measurements and calculations. Here's what you can do with MyTracks: - Track your route: Whether you're hiking, running, or cycling, MyTracks can record your path and show it on a map. - Save favorite locations: If there are specific places you want to remember, you can mark them as favorites in the app. - Import and export data: MyTracks allows you to import and export data in various formats such as CSV, GPX, KML, and KMZ. - Improve accuracy: You can take static GPS observations to get more accurate waypoints for your tracks. - Easy navigation: The app provides a waypoint guide on the compass, making it easy for you to navigate to specific locations. - Customizable waypoints: You can add waypoints manually or import them from your favorite locations. You can even add vectors with angle and distance. - Coordinate conversion: MyTracks allows you to convert between four different coordinate formats (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) at any time. - Additional features: The app displays glide ratio during recording, offers compass options in degrees or mils, supports MGRS Grid overlay on the map, and allows you to create routes to follow before starting your track. - Detailed records: You can view your tracks on a map and replay the route. The app provides detailed statistics about your track and displays the saved waypoints associated with each track. You can also change the color of your tracks for easier identification. Please note that using GPS continuously in the background can drain your device's battery quickly. If you have any feedback or questions, please feel free to contact us at miaozhi.ai@gmail.com

entry.title: IPTV Smart Pro - Live TV
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

Application Description

Get the New Generation Professional IPTV Smart Player application. Download the new generation professional and AI technology IPTV player now and enjoy unlimited entertainment! Forget all the IPTV applications you know! Download your favorite movies and series, Experience what's happening now! Discover Live TV, Movies, Series, Matches, Football, 4K Broadcast Quality, Multi-Screen Watching Opportunity, Parental Control (Pin Code), Forget Freezing Problems, EPG (Electronic Program Guide), EPG link adding support, M3U Membership Link Adding, Login with Xtream API and many more innovations. The application supports many country languages. You buy the application once and use it for life, there is no monthly or annual payment, it does not contain ads. IPTV Smart Player is a quality and ideal solution for your IPTV needs. It is an advanced IPTV player application with high quality and modern design that allows you to watch high-definition broadcasts easily and in full screen without any lag or freezing problems on your Mac. IPTV Smart Player is the ideal, fully professional new generation live broadcast solution with IPTV, LIVE TV, EPG, VOD, Video, Series, Catch-up, Multi-screen and many more features. Features: - Multi-Language Support - Download Your Favorite Movies and Series - Record Your Live Broadcasts as Video - Add Link Support for EPG (TV Guide) - Built-in EPG (TV program guide) support - Xstream API Support - M3u files and URLs (playlists) - Watch Broadcasts Without Freezing or Stuttering - New Generation Advanced 4K Player - Catch-Up (Catch-up feature allows you to watch programs you missed in a certain time period.) - Channel Favorite Support - Multiple screen options - Unlimited user addition - Multi-language support - Channel Search - New modern layout/UI design - Smooth and fast 4K Streaming (Depending on IPTV service provider) - Parental Control (PIN) - Playing local audio/video files - Adding External Players - Built-in speed test function - Dynamic language switching (multilingual) - and much more * No IPTV application offers media content, this is not specific to our application. Users must add their own membership or provide their own content for streaming. * The screenshots shown on this page are for illustrative purposes only and do not refer to an actual video or its content. * IPTV Smart Player is not affiliated with any third-party providers. Legal Disclaimer: https://www.discoverapp.store/disclaimer Privacy Policy: https://www.discoverapp.store/ssv-privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.discoverapp.store/terms-and-conditions Contact: https://www.discoverapp.store/contact
